_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
dn19:2.1+dn19:60.11^who_else_mentioned: Dhatara, Virūḷhaka, Virūpakkha, Vessavaṇa, Buddha, Sakka, Buddhas, the Blessed One, Brahmā, Brahmā Sanaṅkumāra, Great Brahmā, Pañcasikha, Disampati, Steward, Reṇu, Jotipāla, Prince Reṇu, the Steward Jotipāla, the Great Steward, King Disampati, King Reṇu, Great Steward, Kaliṅgas, Potana, Assakas, Mahissati, Avantis, Roruka, Sovīras, Videhas, Aṅgas, Brahmadatta, Vessabhū, Bharata, Dhataraṭ, Bhāratas, The Great Steward
before^dn19:58.7^who_around: the gods of the Thirty-Three, brahmins, ladies, King Reṇu, Prince Reṇu, the man, Jotipāla, the six aristocrats, the Great Steward
